articles.content: From their disappointing tours of 2011 and 2014, India have come a long way in England. In 2018, they went down by a deceptive scoreline of 1-4 against an evenly matched side but more than made up fo… [+16096 chars]

articles.title: Mitchell Santner's departure to Ireland delayed after testing positive for Covid - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Tour starts with first ODI on July 10, with Santner due to take over as captain for T20Is against Ireland, Scotland and Netherlands
